#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(NULL);
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   { int n,k,b[1005],a[1000][1000]={0},i,j;
     scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
     
     for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   	 scanf("%d",&b[i]);
   	 
   	 a[0][0]=1;
   	 
	 for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   	 for(j=0;j<=k;j++)
   	 if(a[i-1][j]==1 || (b[i]<=j && a[i-1][j-b[i]]==1))
   	  a[i][j]=1;
     
    /* for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
     {for(j=0;j<=k;j++)
       cout<<a[i][j]<<"  ";
       
       cout<<"\n";
	 }
    */
	 printf("%d\n",a[n][k]);
   }
	return 0;
}
